overview: A close-knit group of gay friends share the emotional roller coster of life, relationships, the death of friends, new beginnings, jealousy, fatherhood and professional success. At various stages of life's disarray, these young men share humorous and tragic relationships and always have each other to rely on.
original_title: The Broken Hearts Club: A Romantic Comedy
tagline: The shortest distance between friends isn't always a straight line.
cast: Timothy Olyphant|Zach Braff|Ben Weber|Dean Cain|Billy Porter
